Smartphones.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
Smartphones.description: Apple flagship smartphone with A17 Pro chip, 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, and titanium frame.

Laptops.name: Dell XPS 15
Laptops.description: Premium laptop with 15.6-inch 4K OLED display, Intel Core i7-13700H, and NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU.

Tablets.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
Tablets.description: 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and S Pen included.

Headphones.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
Headphones.description: Over-ear wireless noise-canceling headphones with 30-hour battery life.

Wearables (Smartwatches, Fitness Bands).name: Apple Watch Series 9
Wearables (Smartwatches, Fitness Bands).description: Smartwatch with always-on Retina display, advanced health sensors, and GPS.

Refrigerators.name: LG InstaView Door-in-Door Refrigerator
Refrigerators.description: 36-inch French Door refrigerator with InstaView glass panel and smart cooling.

Microwaves.name: Panasonic NN-SN966S
Microwaves.description: 2.2 cu. ft. countertop microwave with inverter technology and 1250W power.

Electric Ovens.name: Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro
Electric Ovens.description: Convection oven with 13 cooking functions including air fry, roast, and dehydrate.

Air Fryers.name: Ninja Foodi 6-in-1 Air Fryer
Air Fryers.description: Large capacity air fryer with dual baskets and multiple cooking modes.

Blenders.name: Vitamix A3500 Ascent Series
Blenders.description: Professional-grade blender with touchscreen controls and self-cleaning function.

Coffee Makers.name: Keurig K-Elite
Coffee Makers.description: Single-serve coffee maker with strong brew and iced coffee settings.

Toasters.name: Cuisinart CPT-180P1
Toasters.description: 4-slice toaster with dual control panels and custom shade settings.

Electric Kettles.name: Fellow Stagg EKG Electric Kettle
Electric Kettles.description: Precision pour-over kettle with variable temperature control.

Air Conditioners.name: Daikin Inverter Split AC FTKM Series
Air Conditioners.description: 1.5-ton split air conditioner with inverter compressor, energy-efficient cooling, and quiet operation.

Fans.name: Dyson AM07 Tower Fan
Fans.description: Bladeless tower fan with Air Multiplier technology for smooth airflow and quiet performance.

Electric Heaters.name: De'Longhi Oil-Filled Radiator TRD40615E
Electric Heaters.description: 1500W oil-filled radiator heater with adjustable thermostat and safety features.

Dehumidifiers.name: Frigidaire FFAD5033W1
Dehumidifiers.description: 50-pint capacity dehumidifier with continuous drain option and custom humidity control.

LED Lamps.name: Philips Hue Go Table Lamp
LED Lamps.description: Portable LED table lamp with adjustable brightness and color settings.

Smart Bulbs.name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance
Smart Bulbs.description: Smart LED bulb with 16 million colors and voice control compatibility.

LED Strips.name: Govee RGBIC LED Strip Lights
LED Strips.description: 16.4 ft RGBIC LED strip lights with app and voice control, multiple scene modes.

Desk Lamps.name: BenQ e-Reading LED Desk Lamp
Desk Lamps.description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with wide coverage and brightness adjustment for reading.

Electric Drills.name: DeWalt DCD791D2 Cordless Drill
Electric Drills.description: 20V MAX XR Li-Ion brushless cordless drill with 2-speed transmission.

Electric Screwdrivers.name: Bosch GO 2 Cordless Screwdriver
Electric Screwdrivers.description: 6.35 mm cordless screwdriver with torque adjustment and USB charging.

Electric Saws.name: Makita XSS02Z Circular Saw
Electric Saws.description: 18V LXT lithium-ion cordless circular saw with 6-1/2-inch blade.

Soldering Irons.name: Weller WLC100 Soldering Station
Soldering Irons.description: 40W soldering station with variable temperature control (5–40 watts).

Sanders.name: Black+Decker BDERO100 Orbital Sander
Sanders.description: 5-inch random orbital sander with hook-and-loop system and dust-sealed switch.

Televisions.name: Samsung QN90C Neo QLED 4K TV
Televisions.description: 65-inch Neo QLED TV with Quantum HDR 32x and anti-glare screen.

Projectors.name: Epson Home Cinema 5050UB
Projectors.description: 4K PRO-UHD 3LCD projector with HDR support and motorized lens control.

Bluetooth Speakers.name: JBL Charge 5
Bluetooth Speakers.description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 20 hours of playtime.

Soundbars.name: Sonos Arc
Soundbars.description: Premium smart soundbar with Dolby Atmos and voice control.

Hair Dryers.name: Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer
Hair Dryers.description: High-speed hair dryer with intelligent heat control and magnetic attachments.

Hair Straighteners.name: GHD Platinum+ Styler
Hair Straighteners.description: Advanced hair straightener with predictive technology for consistent styling.

Electric Shavers.name: Philips Norelco 9000 Series
Electric Shavers.description: Wet and dry electric shaver with SkinIQ technology and precision blades.

Electric Toothbrushes.name: Oral-B iO Series 9
